definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Powdery mildew is a global disease for the cereal crop.
sentences.chinese: 白粉病是禾谷类作物的全球性病害。

sentences.english: Wheat powdery mildew is one of wheat main diseases.
sentences.chinese: 小麦白粉病是小麦的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: Wheat seed-treated With triadimefon is one of the most important measures to control powdery mildew of Wheat.
sentences.chinese: 粉锈宁拌种是小麦白粉病应急防治的关键技术之一。

sentences.english: Fig. 3. Effect of temperature on the conidium germination of powdery mildew fungi in cucurbits.
sentences.chinese: 温度对于瓜类白粉病菌孢子发芽的影响。

sentences.english: A brief review on the development of wheat germplasm with introduced powdery mildew and scab resistance from Haynaldia villosa Sch.
sentences.chinese: 导入白粉病和赤霉病抗性的小麦种质的研究进展。

sentences.english: St. Croix has vigorous growth and good resistance to powdery mildew and black rot.
sentences.chinese: 圣克罗伊的蓬勃发展和良好的抗白粉病和黑腐病。

sentences.english: Fig. 2. Germ tubes of conidia of the gerbera powdery mildew fungus.
sentences.chinese: 非洲菊白粉病菌孢子的发芽管。

sentences.english: The powdery mildew fungus is one of a number of major grape diseases
sentences.chinese: 而白粉病只是葡萄所受的主要病菌性疾病之一。

sentences.english: The powdery mildew in Osmunda japonica is a disease firstly discovered in the west of Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 薇菜白粉病是近年在鄂西地区发现的一种新病害。

sentences.english: However, the micropropagated plants exhibited lower resistance to powder mildew.
sentences.chinese: 微繁殖苗对白粉病的抗性有所下降。

sentences.english: Powdery mildew, for example, evolved in North America.
sentences.chinese: 例如在北美蔓延的白粉病。

definition: boring insect/snout moth's larva (Aphomia gullaris or Plodia interpuncuella or Heliothus armigera etc), major agricultural pest
army worm (e.g. Mythimna separata or Leucania separata etc, major cereal pests)
